document_data.name: House of the Wheel
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of the Wheel''' was a temple dedicated to [[Gond]] located in the city of [[Westgate]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Location: The temple was located in the northwest section of the city at the intersection of [[Westlight Walk]] and [[Westgate Market Street]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The temple was run by High Artificer [[Ashuntira Elhorn]]. Ashuntira was assisted by 11 other priests and 26 followers.
